name: BInputSearch
sample: <BInputSearch animated='false' open='false' hintText='Hint Text' floatingLabelText='Floating Label Text' maxSearchResults='20' errorText='Field is required'  fullWidth='true'  animation='{animationEvent}' filter={filterEvent} onNewRequest={newRequestEvent} onUpdateInput={updateInputEvent}  />

infoArray.name: animated
infoArray.desc: If true, the auto complete is animated as it is toggled.

infoArray.name: open
infoArray.desc: Auto complete menu is open if true.

infoArray.name: dataSource
infoArray.desc: Array of strings or nodes used to populate the list.

infoArray.name: floatingLabelText
infoArray.desc: The content to use for the floating label element.

infoArray.name: fullWidth
infoArray.desc: Default value: false. If true, the field receives the property width: 100%.

infoArray.name: maxSearchResults
infoArray.desc: The max number of search results to be shown. By default it shows all the items which matches filter.

infoArray.name: animation
infoArray.desc: Override the default animation component used.

infoArray.name: filter
infoArray.desc:
Callback function used to filter the auto complete.
Signature:
function(searchText: string, key: string) => boolean

infoArray.name: onNewRequest
infoArray.desc:
Callback function that is fired when a list item is selected, or enter is pressed in the TextField.
Signature:
function(chosenRequest: string, index: number) => void

infoArray.name: onUpdateInput
infoArray.desc:
Callback function that is fired when the user updates the TextField.
Signature:
function(searchText: string, dataSource: array) => void
